about_the_game:
*The game is currently only in alpha so everything is currently only a placeholder *

Start of story summary

Bullying is a major issue and yet no one is even trying to stop it. Many teens harm themselves because of bullying. Some even harm harm others. Some give up on everything, And others live the rest of their lives with their heads down.

Seeing how no one is doing anything about it, a group of individuals decided to start a group called the “Outsiders”. Their main base is an abandoned church that they call the “Outsiders church”. This group was made to help others who are being bullied. 

You got invited to join that group and you are to do missions for them to help them with their cause.

Game play summary

You job is to complete missions in an openworld that are given to you by the group your in. 

You have a large selection of weapons from swords, guns or just using your hands. Doing certain main missions would move the story forward.  You can acquire weapons either by buying them from unlockable npc shops or by killing and looting enemies.

You can also use abilities along side the weapons. Some abilities will make you do more damage or make you faster. While others will shoot a fire ball or freeze enemies. You can customize you own fighting style to suit the experience you want.

content_descriptors.notes: suicide, drugs, killing, abuse, alcohol, harassment, self harm.

name: No forgiveness to the sinners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: I copied these from a game with high requirements to be safe
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560 or equivalent
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 11
  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: I copied these from a game with high requirements to be safe

short_description: Do missions and beat bad guys.
